A man has been arrested following an eight-hour stand-off with police at a house in Bournemouth.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Police sealed off Mountbatten Gardens at 06:30 BST after reports that a man threatened two people with a machete.
An earlier assault at Mallard Road in which a woman was injured is believed to be connected to the incident.
Police said a 34-year-old Bournemouth man has been arrested on suspicion of assault and possession of an offensive weapon.
Summary:

document:
